main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.finder

Class RegionVotingFocusFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.finder.RegionVotingFocusFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FocusFinderInterface<java.lang.Double>

    public class RegionVotingFocusFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements FocusFinderInterface<java.lang.Double>
    The Region voting focus finder uses a voting scheme to decide on the sharpest image.
    Author:
    royer

      Constructs a region voting focus finder from a focus finder factory, image tile matrix size, and amplitude index threshold.
